languages.text: "Нет здесь величия — тем, кто истинно несет правосудие Его, нет нужды скрываться во тьме".
languages.translation_comment:
While exploring the death temple.
Argenta: "The shrouded faith of the Bloodspun Web... It is both frightening and awe-inspiring."

traits.locale_text: "Нет здесь величия — тем, кто истинно несет правосудие Его, нет нужды скрываться во тьме".

languages.text: "There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."
languages.translation_comment:
While exploring the death temple.
Argenta: "The shrouded faith of the Bloodspun Web... It is both frightening and awe-inspiring."
languages.original_text: "Нет здесь величия — тем, кто истинно несет правосудие Его, нет нужды скрываться во тьме".

traits.locale_text: "There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."
"There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."
"There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."
"There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."
"There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."
"There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."

languages.text: 「ここには威厳などない。真に陛下の裁きをもたらす者は、闇に身を潜める必要などないのだから」
languages.original_text: "There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「ここには威厳などない。真に陛下の裁きをもたらす者は、闇に身を潜める必要などないのだから」

languages.text: "Hier gibt es nichts Majestätisches. Wer wahre Gerechtigkeit wirkt, muss sich nicht in der Dunkelheit verstecken."
languages.original_text: "There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Hier gibt es nichts Majestätisches. Wer wahre Gerechtigkeit wirkt, muss sich nicht in der Dunkelheit verstecken."

languages.text: « Il n'y a rien à respecter ici. Ceux qui appliquent légitimement le jugement de l'Empereur n'ont nul besoin de se terrer dans les ténèbres. »
languages.original_text: "There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: « Il n'y a rien à respecter ici. Ceux qui appliquent légitimement le jugement de l'Empereur n'ont nul besoin de se terrer dans les ténèbres. »

languages.text: «No hay nada majestuoso aquí: los verdaderos portadores de Su justicia no necesitan el amparo de la oscuridad».
languages.original_text: "There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: «No hay nada majestuoso aquí: los verdaderos portadores de Su justicia no necesitan el amparo de la oscuridad».

languages.text: “我感觉不到任何威严，帝皇真正的执法者根本不需要躲在黑暗之中。”
languages.original_text: "There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: “我感觉不到任何威严，帝皇真正的执法者根本不需要躲在黑暗之中。”

languages.text: "Burada hükümranlık yok. O'nun adaletini asıl tahsis edenler, gölgelerde saklanmak zorunda olmamalı."
languages.original_text: "There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Burada hükümranlık yok. O'nun adaletini asıl tahsis edenler gölgelerde saklanmak zorunda değil."

languages.original_text: "There is no majesty here — true bringers of His judgement have no need to hide in the darkness."
